skill.name: blog-writer
skill.description: Write and add new blog posts for this Next.js site by matching the existing BlogPost structure in `src/lib/blog-data.ts`. Use when asked to draft a new blog article, update blog content, or produce SEO metadata/slug/image details for a new post.
skill.summary: Write and add new blog posts for this Next.js site by matching the existing BlogPost structure in `s...
skill.author: Eccentric-jamaican

security_audit.summary: No executable code found. This is a documentation-only skill containing markdown files with instructions for creating blog posts. No security risks identified.

content.user_title: Create SEO-Optimized Blog Posts for Next.js Sites
content.value_statement: Writing blog posts that match your site's structure and SEO requirements is time-consuming. This skill creates perfectly formatted posts that follow your existing patterns, complete with metadata and SEO optimization.
actual_capabilities: Creates blog posts matching existing BlogPost structure
Generates SEO metadata including titles and keywords
Follows established voice and tone guidelines
Creates unique slugs in YYYY-MM-DD-topic format
Writes content with proper markdown formatting
limitations: Requires existing blog structure in src/lib/blog-data.ts
Only works with Next.js sites using the specified pattern
Cannot create or upload blog images automatically
Limited to insurance and financial planning topics for Jamaica audience

use_cases.title: Scale Blog Content Creation
use_cases.description: Generate multiple blog posts per week while maintaining consistent quality, tone, and SEO optimization.

use_cases.title: Educate Clients Through Blogs
use_cases.description: Create educational content about insurance and financial planning for Jamaican audiences.

use_cases.title: Boost SEO with Regular Posts
use_cases.description: Maintain consistent blog publishing schedule with SEO-optimized content that ranks locally.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Blog Post
prompt_templates.scenario: Create a simple blog post about insurance
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a blog post about life insurance basics for young families in Jamaica. Include the core benefits and common misconceptions.

prompt_templates.title: Data-Driven Post
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a blog post about retirement savings in Jamaica. Include statistics about average savings and provide actionable steps for improvement.

prompt_templates.title: Myth-Busting Post
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a blog post debunking the top 5 myths about health insurance in Jamaica. Use a myth-busting format with clear explanations.

prompt_templates.title: Seasonal Content
prompt_templates.prompt: Draft a year-end blog post about financial planning resolutions for Jamaicans, including insurance review checklist and tax considerations.

output_examples.input: Write a blog post about the importance of emergency funds for Jamaican households
output: SEO Title: 'Emergency Funds: Why Every Jamaican Household Needs a Financial Safety Net'
Content includes: The Real Issue section explaining common financial emergencies
What the Numbers Say with Jamaican-specific statistics
Common Mistakes to avoid when building emergency funds
Action steps for starting an emergency fund
Proper markdown formatting with H2 and H3 headers

best_practices: Review existing blog posts in src/lib/blog-data.ts to understand tone and structure before creating new content
Use the provided blog-patterns.md template to ensure consistent formatting and sections
Always include a Sources section when citing statistics or external information
anti_patterns: Creating posts without checking existing categories - always reuse existing categories when possible
Forgetting to create unique slugs - ensure no duplicates exist in the blog data
Skipping SEO metadata - always complete title, description, and keywords fields

faq.question: Is this skill compatible with other blog platforms?
faq.answer: No, this skill is specifically designed for Next.js sites using the BlogPost structure in src/lib/blog-data.ts.

faq.question: What are the limitations on blog post length?
faq.answer: There are no strict limits, but posts typically range from 800-1500 words for optimal engagement and SEO.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with my CMS?
faq.answer: This skill outputs markdown content that needs manual addition to your blog data file. Direct CMS integration is not supported.

faq.question: How does the skill ensure data safety?
faq.answer: The skill only generates content suggestions. It doesn't access or modify any files directly - you maintain full control over what gets published.

faq.question: What if the generated content doesn't match my brand voice?
faq.answer: Review the blog-patterns.md file and existing posts in your blog data to refine your prompts for better alignment.

faq.question: How does this compare to general AI writing tools?
faq.answer: This skill is specialized for insurance/financial blogs targeting Jamaican audiences, with built-in SEO optimization and Next.js formatting.
